data.label: Lofelt SDK
data.description: Lofelt Studio 使内容创作者能够利用最新技术提供强大的触觉效果。这套工具允许您通过对音频文件进行详细分析自动生成触觉效果。您可以避免手动编程丰富自然的触觉体验的繁琐过程。重要的是，Lofelt Studio 允许您一次创作触觉效果，然后在各种设备上使用它们。无需为具有不同功能的设备创建不同版本的触觉效果。

data.label: Lofelt SDK
data.description: Lofelt Studio enables content creators to capitalize on the latest technologies for delivering powerful haptic effects. This suite of tools allows you to automatically generate haptic effects by performing detailed analysis of your audio files. You can avoid the painstaking process of manually programming rich and natural haptic experiences. And importantly, Lofelt Studio enables you to author haptic effects once and then use them on a wide variety of devices. There is no need to create different versions of haptic effects for devices with different capabilities.
